message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 3-9-2, translated into en
data:
• At country level

Data are available for practically all countries. They are, however, sometimes based on health statistics provided by international agencies as the national data are incomplete, which have been interpolated/ extrapolated, adjusted, and completed by additional data and cause-of-death models. A more detailed description of the methods is provided in http://www.who.int/healthinfo/global_burden_disease/GlobalCOD_method_2000_2012.pdf

  • At regional and global levels

NA
